mdRecord.dcterms:title: West Front of the Mansion. Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of bowling green gate (closed) with west front of the Mansion in the distance. Inked stamps on the cardboard mount read: West Front of the Mansion. Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va. West Front of the Mansion. Copyrighted by Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon. Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Pa. Ave. Washington, D. C. Photographic Views of Mount Vernon, Home of Washington. For Sale by J. Norman Gibbs, Lunch Rooms outside the Grounds. A penciled note reads: Presented by Mrs. Ca____ Lee, (1 of 6)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Bowling Green Gate
